paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to investigate the existence of Bosbach states and Riecan states on MTL-algebras. We prove that an MTL-algebra L has Bosbach states if and only if L has an MV-filter. We also establish that L has a state-morphism if and only if L has a maximal MV-filter. Furthermore, we obtain the necessary and sufficient condition for an MU-chain having Riecan states. (C) 2012 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the existence of states on MTL-algebras
